name: The Maze (itch) (BoringGamesDev)
description:
# NOW WORK WITH EVERY KEYBOARD  LANGUAGE #

In this exciting new game, players must navigate a procedurally generated maze while avoiding deadly monsters at every turn in an scary Athmosphere . 

As they make their way through the maze, they must use their quick reflexes and cunning to outsmart the monsters and stay alive. With endless levels and challenges, this game is perfect for anyone looking for a thrilling and adrenaline-fueled challenge.

This game is my first University Project Game and my first game ever, so  it's sure to be a hit with players of all skill levels. Can you survive the monster-filled maze and emerge victorious? Play now to find out!

If you have any tips or suggestions on how I can improve my game project, I would really appreciate it if you could leave a comment ! 

This is my very first game, so I'm eager to learn and grow as a game developer. Any feedback is welcome and appreciated!

CONTROLS :

WASD to move

F for toggle light 

ESC for Pause 

LEFT SHIFT to sprint

SPACE to jump

LEFT CTRL to crouch
